desc: Selling Brand New, Scratch and Dent, Factory Second and Refurbished appliances. Fridges, Washing Machines, Dryers and much more. Buy with Confidence from DMS! Buy Now Pay Later with Afterpay, Zip Pay & Latitude. Fast Delivery. Excellent Customer Service, MASSIVE Savings. Open since 1997.

layout.text: Welcome to DMS Appliances, where you'll find the cheapest appliances. Buy New and Used. View our range here!
